title: What is SprintHacks
desc: SprintHacks is an 18-hour hackathon organized by the Developer Student Circuit with endless creativity. The focus is on innovation and creativity as participants work together to develop unique solutions using the latest technology. With opportunities for networking and exciting prizes, this hackathon challenges participants to push their limits and create the next innovative product.

title: How many people per team?
desc: Teams can range anywhere from 2-3 people. If you do not have a team before the event, worry not - you can find one on our handy Discord server.

title: What does it cost?
desc: SprintHacks is free for all hackers! We provide our hackers with workshops, tools, swag, and prizes without any cost through our generous sponsors.

title: What's the mode of Hackathon?
desc: The SprintHacks is in Offline Mode. On the basis of idea submission of teams, few teams will be selected for offline (rest online) and they will receive mail separately.

title: Will there be food?
desc: Yes, food and beverages will be provided throughout the event.

title: Who will be judging?
desc: The judge panel composition will be announced closer to the date of the SprintHacks

title: Why would someone participate in a hackathon?
desc: People participate in hackathons for lots of reason: the challenge, the creative outlet, the community collaboration, the networking, the swagâ€¦
